post:
Welcome Australia (again) to the LowendSpirit family!

After RansomIT decided to stop offering LES services in Australia, ([details here](http://forum.lowendspirit.com/viewtopic.php?pid=18720#p18720)) I got the chance to continue offering that location to new customers.       
Hardware and location is generously donated by RansomIT.

![](https://img.lowendguide.com/i/20180322_151504.png)


Get 128mb in Australia, Germany, Bulgaria, Norway, France and 2 locations in the USA, Kansas City, and Lenoir.      
     
[Order Now for ~ $17,5/year](https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&bid=5)     
       
If you want more RAM, there is also a limited supply of 256mb in all 7 locations.
[Order Now for ~ $31,5/year](https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&bid=6)      
     

Payment options: 
Paypal, Bitcoin and [43 Altcoins](https://coingate.com/accept-altcoins)
      
     
Already bought a bundle and only missing one or two locations?     
Don't worry - buy the same package in the locations you are missing and I'll discount the recurring price to match your previous bundle deal!     
Make an order note that you already bought the bundle once.       
The renewal date will also be matched to the bundle renewal date.      
     
What makes this offer/these offers special     
      
- All locations except France is on a 1Gbbps port     
- DDoS protection in Germany    
- VPS Control Panel integrated into WHMCS, one login to remember.     
- Unlimited bandwidth, in terms, that you get a monthly allocation at full speed. When that limit is reached, speed is capped at 5mbps for the remaining month.     
- Support and community over at the [LES forum](https://forum.lowendspirit.com/) being a perfect example of what can be hosted on LowendSpirit servers, the LES forum runs on a little 128mb LES server!            
     
Other uses: proxies, Teamspeak, general dev boxes, VPN etc and plenty more.           
General special rules for LES aside from the standard terms.        
    * No TOR         
    * This is a no refund product.         
    * Support only via the forums.       
    * No BitTorrent      
              
Note: When ordering the bundle you will be presented with a regular single VPS, you complete this order and it will automatically take you to the next location and the next as you need to set the password and hostname for each server.           
     
    
       
Hetzner - Falkenstein, Germany        
Looking glass: http://lg-de-fks.mrvm.net/        
     
Telepoint Data Center - Sofia Bulgaria     
Looking glass: http://lg-bg-sof.mrvm.net/    
      
TerraHost - Sandefjord, Norway    
Looking glass: http://lg-no-san.mrvm.net/     
       
Ikoula - Reims, France    
Looking glass: http://lg-fr-rhe.mrvm.net     

Nocix - Kansas City, Missouri - USA      
Looking glass: http://lg-us-kck.mrvm.net/       
     
Dacentec - Lenoir, North Carolina - USA      
Looking glass: http://lg-us-ler.mrvm.net/
      
Equinix  - Sydney, Australia     
Looking glass: http://lg-au-syd.mrvm.net
